findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeAccountinReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are a long list of excluded addresses.

findings.title: Potential OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list
findings.description: The function includeAccountinReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
